entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
